page.title: 14GILMORTON CUBS & SCOUTS
page.content: The Gilmorton Scout group caters for the same catchment area as the school. Cub scouts:Age range:8 years to 10.5 26 boys.The cub pack is divided into groups of 6.Each six has a leader and second.Cubs study for badges.Arrow badges are gained for a broad range of subjects.Proficiency badges are awarded for individual skills.e.g.swimming,hobbies,explorers. Cub sports are very important.In 1985 Gilmorton Cubs won the Leicestershire County Cross-Country Championship and enjoyed many football matches. Scouts:Age range 10.5 to 15 years.24 boys.Structured into patrols of 6 boys.The emphasis is on personal skills through badges.The programme includes camping,canoeing,hiking and traditional skills like knots. Venture Scouts 15 to 21years,5 boys,1 girl.Develops leadership skills.
